code:
---
id: auth-metrics-flow
title: "SmartEdify – Auth Metrics Flow"
description: "Instrumentation path for login, refresh, and password recovery metrics across the auth lifecycle."
updated: 2025-02-14
tags: [Security_IntrusionDetection]
---
flowchart TD
    subgraph Request[Security_OAuth2]
        L[Security_OAuth2]
        V[Security_IntrusionDetection]
        H[Security_ZeroTrust]
        T[Security_Firewall]
        R[Security_Encryption]
    end

    L --> V --> H -->|ok| T --> R
    H -->|fail| F[Security_ZeroTrust]

    subgraph Metrics[Security_IntrusionDetection]
        MS[Security_Firewall]
        MF[Security_IntrusionDetection]
        MR[Security_ZeroTrust]
        MP[Security_OAuth2]
    end

    R --> MS
    F --> MF

    subgraph Refresh[Security_ZeroTrust]
        C[Security_ZeroTrust] -->|reuse| RU[Security_OAuth2]
        C -->|clean| NI[Security_Encryption]
    end

    T --> C
    RU --> MR
    PS[Security_OAuth2] --> MP

    classDef metric fill:#eef,stroke:#336
    class MS,MF,MR,MP metric
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
